DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Limb Recovery Expected Duration Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Coded response indicating a persons' stated expectation of the length of time required to recover from their limb treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Limb Recovery Expected Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._Considered likely or probable; anticipated._The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity.:A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.:Considered likely or probable; anticipated.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.
The period of time during which something continues.

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Coded values representing the expected amount of time required to recover from treatment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I do not expect a full recovery

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I do not expect a full recovery
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does not expect a complete recovery.

Concepts.longName: Do Not Expect a Full Recovery
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does not expect a complete recovery.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I didn't know what to expect.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I didn't know what to expect.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual didn't know what to expect.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Know What to Expect
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does or didn't know what to expect.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: How long do you think it will
ReferenceDocuments.description: How long do you think it will take you to recover from your treatment for your arm or leg problem?
